content.body: zcorpan: (or anybody else set up to do HTTP Archive queries) Can you do query to find out how many pages have `shift_jis` (lowercase) in the `<meta charset>` or `<meta http-equiv content>` values? Or in the `Content-Type` header?
content.formatted_body: zcorpan: (or anybody else set up to do HTTP Archive queries) Can you do query to find out how many pages have shift_jis (lowercase) in the <meta charset> or <meta http-equiv content> values? Or in the Content-Type header?
